notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
notFound.description: The page you requested might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
notFound.suggestions: Here are some things you can try:
notFound.suggestion2: Go back to the previous page
notFound.suggestion4: Contact support if the problem persists

auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.

settings.title: Settings

settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application.
settings.manageAccountDetails: Manage your account details and preferences.
settings.managePrivacySecurity: Manage your privacy and security preferences.
settings.accountSettingsPlaceholder: Account settings will be implemented here.

settings.privacySettingsPlaceholder: Privacy settings will be implemented here.
settings.usernameReadOnly: Username cannot be changed for security reasons
settings.minLength2: Must be at least 2 characters long

board.errorLoadingBoards: There was an error loading your boards. Please try again.
board.noBoardsMatchSearch: No boards match your search criteria.
board.clickToCreateBoard: Click to create a new kanban board
board.boardCouldNotBeLoaded: The requested board could not be loaded.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long

errors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please try again.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.pageNotFound: The page you are looking for could not be found.
errors.pageGone: This page seems to have wandered off to another board.
errors.maybeMoved: Maybe it got moved to a different column or deleted entirely.
errors.funFact: Did you know? The first Kanban board was created by Toyota in the 1940s to improve manufacturing efficiency!
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
